definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: For Clarissa, the entree is just the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 對克拉麗莎來說，主菜只是是個開頭。

sentences.english: Any Suggestion for the main Course?
sentences.chinese: 對於主菜有什麼建議呢？

sentences.english: Dessert silverware, if not brought out with the dessert, are placed at the top of your entrée plate.
sentences.chinese: 如果甜品沒擺出來，裝甜品的銀器就放在主菜盤。

sentences.english: Why weren’t people duped into favoring the high-priced candies and entrees?
sentences.chinese: 人們爲什麼不受高價糖果和主菜的誘惑？

sentences.english: Main course: Meat, or seafood is an entree.
sentences.chinese: 肉類，海鮮類菜餚是主菜。

sentences.english: The main dishes for Thanksgiving Day are turkey and pumpkin pie.
sentences.chinese: 感恩節家宴上的主菜是火雞和南瓜餡餅。

sentences.english: B:Yes.it took more than an hour to serve the main course at our table.
sentences.chinese: 是的，等了超過一小時我們的主菜才上桌。

sentences.english: Yes.it took more than an hour to serve the main course at our table.
sentences.chinese: 是的，等了超過一小時我們的主菜才上桌。

sentences.english: We cooked a five-course meal on that little stove.
sentences.chinese: 我們在小爐子煮了一桌有五個主菜的豐盛大餐。

sentences.english: It took more than an hour to serve the main course at our table.
sentences.chinese: 等了超過一小時我們的主菜才上桌。

sentences.english: The main course was roast pork with apple sauce, the dessert was trifle.
sentences.chinese: 主菜是烤豬肉加蘋果醬，雪利酒蛋糕做爲飯後甜食。

sentences.english: Have a big salad before the main course.
sentences.chinese: 在上主菜前先來個大份的色拉。

sentences.english: Tilapia has gained in popularity because one fillet by itself can be a main course.
sentences.chinese: 羅非魚受歡迎則是因爲一塊魚肉就可以做成一道主菜。

sentences.english: Stay away from entrees with heavy sauces.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫添有大量醬料的主菜。

sentences.english: Some meals may include appetizers, soup or salad before the main course.
sentences.chinese: 在主菜之前，有些聚餐會上開胃菜，湯品或者沙拉。

sentences.english: The main dish is often turkey with stuffing.

definition: dish (food prepared according to a specific recipe)
signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
